EXPERIMENT.center_name: Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology
EXPERIMENT.TITLE: PromethION single-end Sequencing of raw single-cell cDNA library of mBrain without size selection (KAE24065159)

LIBRARY_DESCRIPTOR.LIBRARY_CONSTRUCTION_PROTOCOL: The Nanopore sequencing library was prepared from the raw single-cell cDNA library using the Native Barcoding Kit 24 V14 kit (#SQK-NBD114.24, Oxford Nanopore Technologies) following the manufactureru0026#39;s protocol. The sequencing library was then loaded to a PromethION flow cell (R10.4.1) (# FLO-PRO114M, Oxford Nanopore Technologies) and sequenced on the PromethION 24 (Oxford Nanopore Technologies) with a sampling rate of 5 kHz. The raw sequencing output (FAST5 or POD5) was basecalled with Guppy (version 6.5.7) using the u0026quot;SUPu0026quot; basecalling model (the most accurate and slowest) u0026quot;dna_r10.4.1_e8.2_400bps_5khz_sup.cfgu0026quot;. The low-quality reads were filtered using the minimum quality score of 9.

EXPERIMENT.center_name: Gwangju Institute of Science and Technology
EXPERIMENT.TITLE: PromethION single-end Sequencing of Ouro-Seq-applied (Ouro-Deplete targeting uninformative transcripts derived from rRNA and mtDNA) single-cell cDNA library of mBrain without size selection (KAE24065170)

LIBRARY_DESCRIPTOR.LIBRARY_CONSTRUCTION_PROTOCOL: A single-cell cDNA library was processed with Ouro-Deplete for targeted depletion of cDNAs from mtDNA and rRNA. The Nanopore sequencing library was prepared from the Ouro-Seq-applied single-cell cDNA library using the Native Barcoding Kit 24 V14 kit (#SQK-NBD114.24, Oxford Nanopore Technologies) following the manufactureru0026#39;s protocol. The sequencing library was then loaded to a PromethION flow cell (R10.4.1) (# FLO-PRO114M, Oxford Nanopore Technologies) and sequenced on the PromethION 24 (Oxford Nanopore Technologies) with a sampling rate of 5 kHz. The raw sequencing output (FAST5 or POD5) was basecalled with Guppy (version 6.5.7) using the u0026quot;SUPu0026quot; basecalling model (the most accurate and slowest) u0026quot;dna_r10.4.1_e8.2_400bps_5khz_sup.cfgu0026quot;. The low-quality reads were filtered using the minimum quality score of 9.
